A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Disney went an interesting route with this one.  It's not often a corporation is stupid enough to make a movie in which their hardcore fans are depicted as awful people.  Yet\, here we are\, where Disney has made literally every white male in the movie a bad guy.  Oh\, also\, if you have any form of wealth\, you are \"the worst people in the universe.\"  Personally\, I am now done with Star Wars and will never go see another movie or buy any merchandise.  They have definitely lost me as a fan forever.
